title: Pbe on a mac
body:
Dear Riot games,
    I can't wait to use the pbe not only for the early uses but for feedback so the game is better!
The problem i have is the fact that i can't use both the live servers and the pbe without having one server stuck on the other without having to uninstall it and installing it again. Ive been told to put them on different files ,but How do i do that on a mac? I also think it has to do with my account, because the pbe account i created is the same username and password on the live servers. Can you please help me, as to how to peacefully play on the pbe and live servers without any problems happen, on a mac.

replies.body: The PBE Client and the Alpha Client are two different things! You'll have had to download the PBE Client as well to create an account, in which you should have received and email with instructions. If you didn't however, this [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client) should give you all the steps to start testing out new content.

I did get the email for creating the account since i was accepted into PBE, but i mistakenly  
put the same user and password, forgetting part of the instructions
